resources.string: Here\'s how it works: 1. Enter your data below. 2. Tap Start. 3. Tap each block as you eat the food!
Each Block is set to the below calorie count. Tap each block to learn more
To record the item, simply tap it.
Tap this to go to the home screen
This beauty will bring you back here.
Finished your tracking? Tap this button to reset.
1c skim or 1% milk 8oz plain, non-fat yogurt. Cream cheese, all varieties, are counted as fats, not protein or dairy.
Calories: 90 Carbs: 12 Protein: 8 grams Fat: trace (1 dairy block)
1 ounce full fat cheese (one Dairy PLUS 2 Fat windows)
These can be either a Protein Exchange or a Dairy exchange 1oz of cheese, 2tbsp grated Parmesan, 1/4c fat free ricotta or cottage cheese

1 teaspoon butter or margarine 10 almonds 20 peanuts 1 teaspoon mayonnaise 10 small or 5 large olives 2 tablespoons low calorie salad dresing 1 tablespoon reduced calorie mayonnaise 2 teaspoons tahini 1 strip bacon 2 strips turkey bacon 3 tablespoons coconut milk 1 tablespoon cream cheese 2 tablespoons reduced fat (Neufatchel) cream cheese 2 tablespoons sour cream
Calories: 45 Carbs.: 0 grams Protein: 0 grams Fat: 5 grams (1 fat window)
Usual serving size: 1 small fruit (apple, plum, pear, etc.) 2 tablespoons dried fruit (raisins) 4 ounces unsweetened fruit juice 1/2 cup pureed or chopped fruit (applesauce)
Calories: 60 Carbs.: 15 grams Protein: 0 grams Fat: 0 grams (1 fruit window)

One serving of Protein is one ounce of meat or fish, 2 ounces of most shellfish. A usual serving is 3 to 4 ounces, so be sure to close that many windows. Don\'t cheat yourself - the weight is after cooking, not before.
Medium Protein Calories: 75 Carbs.: 0 grams Protein: 7 grams Fat: 5 grams (1 protein block)
High-Fat Protein Calories: 100 Carbs.: 0 grams Protein: 7 grams Fat: 8 grams (1 protein + 1 fat block)
Very High-Fat Protein Calories: 136 Carbs.: 0 grams Protein: 7 grams Fat: 12 grams (1 protein + 2 fat block)

1 slice of bread 2 slices low calorie/diet bread 2 breadsticks 1/2 of a 6 inch pita 6 corn tortilla or 7 flour tortilla 3 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs 1/2 cup pasta 1/3 cup rice (white or brown) 1/2 cup of hot cereal 1/2 hot dog or burger roll 1/4 cup baked beans 1/2 cup beans and peas (kidney, garbanzo) 1/3 cup refried beans 1/4 cup hummus
Calories: 80 Carbs.: 15 grams Protein: 3 grams Fat: trace (1 starch block)
Calories: 120 Carbs.: 15 grams Protein: 3 grams Fat: 5 grams (1 starch + 1 fat block)
Calories: 144 Carbs.: 15 grams Protein: 3 grams Fat: 8 grams (1 starch + 2 fat blocks)
Extras are used for some very low calorie snacks, or to account for a few extra calories when your foods don\'t quite add up to one full window in any particular category.
Calories: 30 or less Carbs.: varies Protein: varies Fat: varies (1 treat block)
Calories: 25 Carbs.: 5 grams Protein: 2 grams Fat: 0 grams (1 vegetable block)
High starch plant products, such as beans, are listed as Starches, not Vegetables
Vegetables are also listed under Bonus Most vegetable exchanges: raw = 1 cup cooked = 1/2 cup juice - 1/2 cup
